Generation VI.X: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
Generation VI.Y: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph . It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph . It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

Generation VII.Sun: Its favorite foods are Wingull and Pikipek . It attacks with a powerful kick and grasps them firmly in its talons.
Generation VII.Moon: It zooms directly at its prey at flight speeds of close to 310 mph , while fiery embers scatter from gaps in its feathers.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Its tough wings don't allow fire to pass through them. A long time ago, firefighters' outfits were made from Talonflame wings.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Bird Pokémon make up most of its diet. It approaches at high speeds and smacks them down to the ground with its powerful kick.

Generation VIII.Sword: Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird Pokémon. To intimidate opponents, it sends embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.
Generation VIII.Shield: Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to 310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks, giving the prey no chance to escape.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It has top-notch flying capabilities. It flies around easily, even while carrying prey that weighs more than 220 lbs .
Generation IX.Violet: When it gets excited, it vents sparks from the gaps between its feathers. These unburnable feathers are used as a fireproof material.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Soothing Wetlands , Loop Lagoon , Training Lowlands ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Three Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Three Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
